findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification may leave the Disclosing Party vulnerable to losses arising from breaches of confidentiality.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid may not adequately protect against significant damages or losses.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: No audit rights may restrict the Disclosing Party's ability to verify compliance with confidentiality obligations.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Not addressing intellectual property rights may lead to disputes regarding ownership of ideas or innovations shared.
Requiring one party to cover attorney fees may deter them from pursuing valid claims due to potential costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The Receiving Party shall pay all attorneys' fees and costs incurred by the Disclosing Party in enforcing this Agreement.
